### Invitation to Qualify

**Notice:** Invitation to Qualify — Stage 1

#### Tender Reference

* Reference Number: CBC-618-28967648
* Solicitation Number: 5P420-23-0397/A
* Amendment Number: 1
* Closing Date and Time: June 11, 2024, 16:00:00 MDT

#### Tender Overview

Parks Canada Agency invites qualified contractors to submit a bid to maintain the electrical infrastructure of five snow sheds located on the Trans-Canada Highway (Highway 1) in the Glacier National Park between Revelstoke and Golden. The selected contractor is expected to provide maintenance services from November 1, 2024, to October 31, 2026.

### Tender Requirements

The maintenance services include, but are not limited to:

* Inspection and maintenance of the electrical infrastructure, including power, lighting, and control systems.
* Repair and replacement of electrical components as required.
* Maintenance of snow shed lighting systems.
* Compliance with National Parks Regulations and the National Park Act.

### Contract Period

The Contract period is from November 1, 2024, to October 31, 2027, inclusive. The Contractor grants to Canada the option to extend the Contract for two (2) additional one (1) year periods.

### Selection Process

This is a two-stage selection process. Bidders responding to this Invitation to Qualify are requested to submit a bid in two phases. The first phase (Stage One) will evaluate the qualifications of all interested contractors. The second phase (Stage Two) will invite the qualified contractors to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings.

### Tender Documents

Tender documents can be obtained from the Government Electronic Tenders website at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities). Addenda, when issued, will be available from the same website. Bidders are required to submit their bid via email to [soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca](mailto:soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca) or fax to 1-866-246-6893. Please note that bids submitted in-person or by courier will not be accepted.

### Contact Information

For additional information or to request clarification on any aspect of the tender, please contact:

* Daniel Nguyen, Contracting Authority
* Email: [daniel.nguyen@pc
